caption.title: Amino acid variations in P domain.
caption.p: Amino acid changes observed in minor variants (yellow) were highlighted on the GII.4 P domain (side view), using the GII.4 2012 P2 domain structure (PDB id 4OOS; available at https://www.rcsb.org/structure/4OOS). The reference structure shows epitopes A (red), C (green), D (pink) and E (brown). The Jmol software was used to localize the amino acid residues (Jmol: an open-source Java viewer for chemical structures in 3D. http://www.jmol.org/).
